title: HandBrake 1.7.2 Improves Automatic Selection of Dolby Vision Level
description:
HandBrake 1.7.2 open-source video transcoder software is now available for download with the automatic selection of Dolby Vision Level and the performance of the app on Linux systems.

The post HandBrake 1.7.2 Improves Automatic Selection of Dolby Vision Level appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
